args.subject: Invoice for your mouse replacement
args.body:
Hi Alice,

I’ve reordered the same TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse you bought last time and applied my available discount. Attached is the invoice for your records.

Best,
Emma

args.subject: Invoice for your mouse replacement
args.body:
Hi Alice,

I’ve reordered the same TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse you bought last time and applied my available discount. Attached is the invoice for your records.

Best,
Emma

content.content:
I’ve reordered the same TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse as your last purchase, applied your available discount, and completed checkout.

I’ve also sent an email to Alice at `alice.miller@gmail.com`, with the invoice for order `ORDER-644177` attached (and CC’d you at your work email) so she has the documentation for her replacement mouse.
